patterns.message: Modules must not import node:fs directly. Use the filesystem adapter provided via the execution context.
Modules must not import node:child_process directly. Use the exec adapter provided via the execution context.
Modules must not import node:net directly. Use the network adapter provided via the execution context.
Modules must not import node:http/https directly. Use the network adapter provided via the execution context.
Kernel must be side-effect-free. node:fs is forbidden. Filesystem I/O belongs in packages/runtime-host.
Kernel must be side-effect-free. node:child_process is forbidden. Process execution belongs in packages/runtime-host.
Kernel must be side-effect-free. node:net is forbidden. Network I/O belongs in packages/runtime-host.
Kernel must be side-effect-free. node:http/https is forbidden. Network I/O belongs in packages/runtime-host.
